task.title: Starting a meeting recording
task.shortdesc: You can record meetings for which you are the meeting owner.

taskbody.context:
Tap the meeting menu icon and tap Record the meeting. Before the recording is started, you must agree with saving the meeting by the recording service prompt. After the recording starts, all participants are notified that the meeting is being recorded. From the meeting menu, click Stop recording to stop the recording.
The recording link is available in the meeting chat if the Share recording in meeting chat setting is enabled. The meeting name, time the recording ended, and recording expiration date is displayed. If the meeting recording is not shared, only the meeting owner has access to the recording.
